subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon gave up four runs in the first inning of a loss by the Mets, who were considering placing Jon Niese on the disabled list after he was struck by a line drive Friday.
snippet: Bartolo Colon gave up four runs in the first inning of a loss by the Mets, who were considering placing Jon Niese on the disabled list after he was struck by a line drive Friday.
